name: Path to Oshun
description:
Play as Sona, a young black woman going through a journey of self-reflection and discovery. 3D Action-Exploration made in Unreal Engine 4. 

Known Bugs: (as of 3.17.2022)

  • Opening cinematic may not play when you start the game. To solve, quit and restart the game.
  • Oshosi Orb (Projectile) may sometimes stay mid-air while you aim and release.
  • Oya Orb (Shield) may loop infinitely, we recommend restarting the game.
  • After completing the game, we recommend players quit from main menu and restart the game to make sure all sounds work as intended.
